Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Note on Federal Data Protection Act. This data will be collected, processed and used due to and for the purposes of Sections 31 and 62-78 of the Income Tax Act and according to the rules of the tax code, the Federal Child Benefit Act and the social insurance code. We guarantee that we have provided all information truthfully. We are aware that we must inform the Family Payments Office without delay of any changes that are relevant to our entitlement to Child Benefit.
